term.title: negative hyper-conjugation

item.text: The effect of donation of electron density from filled π or nπ-orbitals to the symmetry adapted σ*-orbital(s) of σ-bond(s) of a molecular entity resulting in building π-character into bonds that nominally possess only σ-character. The consequences of the effect are, for example, in elongation of the C–F bond in the β-fluoroethyl anion and stabilization of the anti-periplanarconformation of fluoromethylamine.[image: Not defined]
